fullplot: Yong Ho, a problematic guy, is walking alone at the riverside. He suddenly bumped with his friend's reunion. He join them and after that go to the railway to commit suicide.Then, the train reverse back to show why he become like that from the beginning. Covers five phase of his life.
plot: Consists of five phases of a man's life about why he committed suicide in the end.
title: Peppermint Candy
